welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lentini, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Smaller terminal for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comiso Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Comiso Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
